definition: joist that receives the end of a header in floor or roof framing in order to leave an opening for a staircase or chimney etc.
details:
noun
- joist that receives the end of a header in floor or roof framing in order to leave an opening for a staircase or chimney etc.
= synonyms: trimmer joist
- capacitor having variable capacitance
= synonyms: trimming capacitor
- a machine that trims timber
- a worker who thins out and trims trees and shrubs
= synonyms: pruner
